Package neqsim.process.ml.surrogate

package neqsim.process.ml.surrogate
Surrogate models and physics constraint validation for AI/ML integration.

This package provides infrastructure for hybrid physics-ML systems:

  • Surrogate Registry: Cache and manage trained ML models
  • Physics Validation: Verify AI actions against physical constraints
  • Fallback Support: Automatic fallback to rigorous physics

Design Principles:

  1. Physics First: ML augments, never replaces, thermodynamic rigor
  2. Safety by Design: Constraints enforced before action execution
  3. Explainability: All decisions traceable to physical constraints

Usage Pattern:

// Register surrogate
SurrogateModelRegistry.getInstance().register("flash-model", myNeuralNet);

// Use with physics fallback
double[] result = registry.predictWithFallback("flash-model", input, physicsModel::calculate);

// Validate AI actions
PhysicsConstraintValidator validator = new PhysicsConstraintValidator(process);
ValidationResult check = validator.validate(proposedAction);
if (!check.isValid()) {
  System.out.println("Rejected: " + check.getRejectionReason());
}
Version:
1.0
Author:
ESOL

  • Class
    Description
    PhysicsConstraintValidator
    Validates AI-proposed actions against physics constraints.
    PhysicsConstraintValidator.Constraint
    Base interface for constraints.
    PhysicsConstraintValidator.ConstraintCheckResult
    Internal result of checking a single constraint.
    PhysicsConstraintValidator.ConstraintViolation
    Details of a constraint violation.
    PhysicsConstraintValidator.EquipmentConstraint
    Constraint on specific equipment.
    PhysicsConstraintValidator.PhysicalBoundConstraint
    Constraint on physical bounds (e.g., positive temperature).
    PhysicsConstraintValidator.ValidationResult
    Result of a validation check.
    SurrogateModelRegistry
    Registry for managing trained surrogate (machine learning) models.
    SurrogateModelRegistry.SurrogateMetadata
    Metadata for a surrogate model.
    SurrogateModelRegistry.SurrogateModel
    Interface for surrogate model implementations.
    SurrogateModelRegistry.SurrogateModelEntry
    Internal entry combining model and metadata.
